模块 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.World

类 InteractableWorld

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.World.InteractableWorld
public class InteractableWorld extends Object
The InteractableWorld handles all of the game's operations: updating positions, checking for collisions, and removing objects.
另请参阅:
GameController
